sub_title: "Transforming the Future with IoT: Experienced Professional Driving Innovation and Impact"
summary:
As an enthusiastic professional with proven expertise in IoT technology, I am passionate about the possibilities that digital transformation offers. With my in-depth knowledge of IoT technologies and experience in implementing successful IoT solutions, I help businesses innovate and create value in the rapidly changing digital world.

My analytical and results-driven approach enables me to tackle complex IoT challenges and find effective solutions. Through my customer-centric approach, I understand the needs of my clients and deliver customized solutions that meet their specific requirements.

I stay up-to-date with the latest trends and developments in the field of IoT and continually expand my knowledge to stay abreast of the latest technological advancements. As a true team player, I am able to collaborate with various stakeholders to work together on successful IoT projects.

Let's work together to harness the potential of IoT technology and add value to your business!

courses.name: Professional Scrum Product Owner Level I

profile_positions.description:
Wireless Logic is a company that focuses on delivering high-quality IoT solutions for various applications in different domains. We help businesses innovate with flexible, resilient, and secure solutions in the field of mobile IoT connectivity.

As Key Account Sales Executive at Wireless Logic, I am responsible for assisting customers in achieving their business objectives through the deployment of IoT technology. I do this by providing advice and offering customized end-to-end connectivity solutions. My interpersonal skills enable me to build and maintain successful relationships with my customers. I have experience working with clients in various sectors and setting up and coordinating complex projects.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Sales Executive

profile_positions.description: Since 2011, I have co-founded several business companies within the e-commerce industry. Hereby the core of our business is mainly importing goods from abroad and marketing and distributing it here in the Netherlands. During the past years I have built up sustainable relationships with our manufactures abroad which ensure us of a fast transportation process and enable us offering high quality products here in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
In addition to logistics services, PostNL also offers the “Verhuisservice” (moving service) proposition to consumers who moves within Netherlands (yearly around 1.8 millions people). This allows the moving consumers to easily and quickly communicate their relocation (change of address) to all companies with which they have a customer relationship. 

As Senior Account Manager at PostNL's moving service domain, I am responsible for:

• Relationship management with the existing top 100 customers of the “Verhuisservice” and taking care of cross and upsell
• Acquisition of new customers (companies) who are not yet connected to PostNL's “Verhuisservice”
• Translating the opportunities and needs from the market into our proposition in collaboration with the product and IT development team

By building and maintaining good relationships with the accounts (customers) whom I am responsible for and helping them optimally with their challenges, I have managed to keep them as a customer until now. In addition, I have offered additional services to some of my accounts which created value for both the client and PostNL in terms of financial. Until now I was also able to acquire some new customers for the “Verhuisservice”, among others vandebron, plein.nl, Coolblue and BENU.
profile_positions.title: Senior Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Building Blocks is a fast growing (2019: Deloitte Fast50, FD Gazellen, Gartner Cool Vendor for Data Science and Machine Learning Service Providers) data science company that predicts consumer behavior for leading retail and insurance companies. 

Within Building Blocks I was responsible for the new business domain. In this, I had performed among others the following activities:

• Researching organizations and individuals to find new opportunities (prospecting)
• Contacting potential prospects to establish relationship and arrange meetings
• Developing quotes and proposals for clients in collaboration with our data scientists
• Attending conferences, meetings, and industry events in order to gathering knowledge and networking
• Planning and overseeing new marketing initiatives
• Aligning the needs from the market with our propositions in collaboration with our product management department
• Relationship management with existing clients and ensuring a healthy cross and upsell.

During my career at Building Blocks I have closed multiple deals all from the new business perspective (the deals sizes varied between 35K - 100K). Beside this via awareness activities within the insurance market I have enabled that one of our core propositions for this market was recognized and nominated and eventually won the prestigieus prize "NVGA AM Innovatieprijs 2019", see the below post.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Due to the huge numbers of visitors on bol.com, the platform is an excellent place for advertisers to show their ads to the Dutch and Belgian customers. The department Bol.com Retail Media Group (BRMG) is responsible for the ads shown on bol.com. In addition, BRMG manages and develops all advertising types that advertisers can use on bol.com.

My assignment within BRMG was to develop two new marketing propositions that would be profitable and also at the same time relevant for the advertisers. So I developed the proposition Marketing Insights and proposition Targeted Mailings and brought them into the market. In this, I had performed the following activities:

• Translating the customer needs (advertisers) to solutions and transforming them into the final propositions
• Pitching the new propositions to the advertisers and closing deals (sales)
• Coordinating and guiding the operational team to execute the campaigns and the invoicing
• Relationship management with the advertisers (account management)

For both propositions I was able to close a total of 18 deals during 1.5 years, varying between 10K to 60K. For the Targeted Mailings even the full capacity for 2017 was sold out which was a great success.
profile_positions.title: Proposition Development Manager

profile_positions.description: Capgemini Financial Services brings deep industry experience, innovative service offerings and next generation global delivery to serve the financial services industry. Capgemini collaborates with leading banks, insurers and capital market companies to deliver business and IT solutions and thought leadership which create remarkable value. During my career at Capgemini (4,5 years) I had worked for different enterprises including ING, ABN-AMRO, Achmea and NN as a business consultant. You can read a detailed description of my activities in below sections.
profile_positions.title: IT Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Within National Nederlanden Pensions, there worked fourteen different scrum teams on development and testing of new functionalities for the existing applications and maintaining of these applications. Part of the development work was carried out by Nearshore in close collaboration with Onshore.

Responsibilities & Achievements:
•	Drafting various user stories based on the activities out of the MT roadmap. Some of this user stories are already brought live.
•	Refining & presenting these user stories to the scrum team members.
•	Organizing workshops and interviews with involved stakeholders for gathering all of the needed requirements for the user stories and aligning the desired functionality with the business.
•	Coordinating and collaborating the Nearshore developers to develop the desired functionality.
profile_positions.title: Information Analyst (via Capgemini)

profile_positions.description:
Within ING Channels there worked forty Scrum teams simultaneously on several applications for the mijn.ing.nl and the mobile app of ING. All these teams had needed test data to test the built functionality of their application. I was responsible to arrange these test data for the whole Channel department and coordinating the whole process of creating the test data.

Responsibilities & Achievements:
•	Mapping out the information landscape of ING Channels containing all of the relevant systems, data bases and data flows
•	Coordinating of all the parties which had to enter new data in the different systems and aligning the output of each of them to achieve a high level of data consistency within the whole chain.
•	Retrieving data from different databases using various SQL queries.
•	Delivering multiple data sets to the scrum teams to perform their tests and so enabling them to bring the new features live.
profile_positions.title: Information Analyst (via Capgemini)

profile_positions.description:
For more alignment between the IT systems of the subsidiaries of Achmea, it was desired to migrate the back-end system of the website of Achmea Interpolis from the Tridion system to the SharePoint system. The reason for this was that all of the subsidiaries of Achmea had to move to the SharePoint system.

Responsibilities & Achievements:
•	In a small team I have migrated the entire website “www.interpolis.nl” to the new SharePoint back-end system.
•	Considering the size of the website, 2000 pages, I have done a big part of the migration automatically (with the tool Metalogix). In this, I regularly had to modify the source code (HTML, CSS & JavaScript) to get a fully working page.  
•       Providing different trainings to the internal employee of Interpolis to teach them how to work independently with the new back-end system.
•	Within the deadline I have succeed to migrate the entire website to the new back-end system and the new website went live in Februari 2013. The management team of Interpolis was very satisfied with the end result and complimented me and my colleagues for the delivered work.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst (via Capgemini)

profile_positions.description:
After the merger of Fortis and ABN AMRO, the migration of the former Fortis system to ABN AMRO system was necessary.

Responsibilities & Achievements:
•	Retrieving data from different databases and performing a quality check on this in order to    migrating the client data to the new system.
•	Within the deadline of the project all of the client data was migrated to the new system. A quote from the client: "Shahin is positive and works very accurately. He did an excellent job."
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst (via Capgemini)
